_description: Unit collision and separation configuration - controls how units space themselves apart

separation._description: Separation force parameters - prevents unit overlapping
separation._multiplier_description: Base separation distance = (radius1 + radius2) * multiplier. Units separate at this proportion of their combined radii.
separation._queryRadiusMultiplier_description: Spatial query radius = unit's collision radius * this value. Determines how far to search for neighbors.
separation._strengthMoving_description: Separation force while moving. Low value allows SC2-style clumping during group movement.
separation._strengthIdle_description: Separation force when idle. Strong to ensure clear visual distinction between units.
separation._strengthArriving_description: Separation force when arriving at destination. Very strong to create natural spreading.
separation._strengthCombat_description: Separation force during combat. Strong for unclumping while fighting.
separation._maxForce_description: Maximum separation force magnitude. High value allows strong separation when units overlap.
separation._flyingMultiplier_description: Separation force multiplier for flying units. Flying units have more freedom and need stronger separation.

physics._description: Physics pushing parameters - units push through each other when overlapping
physics._pushRadius_description: Distance at which physics pushing starts (world units).
physics._pushFalloff_description: How quickly push force falls off with distance. Higher = faster falloff.
physics._overlapPush_description: Extra strong push force when units overlap. Quickly resolves accidental overlaps.

idle._description: Idle behavior parameters - how units behave at rest
idle._separationThreshold_description: Minimum separation force magnitude to move an idle unit. Prevents micro-adjustments.
idle._repelSpeedMultiplier_description: Speed multiplier for idle unit repulsion movement. Slower prevents jittery behavior.

combat._spreadSpeedMultiplier_description: Speed multiplier when units spread apart during combat.
combat._separationThreshold_description: Minimum separation magnitude to trigger combat movement.

arrival._description: Arrival spreading parameters - units spread when reaching destination
arrival._spreadRadius_description: Distance from target where arrival spreading kicks in (world units).

defaults._description: Default collision radius values when not specified in assets.json
defaults._groundUnitRadius_description: Default collision radius for ground units (world units).
defaults._flyingUnitRadius_description: Default collision radius for flying units (world units).
